dict.string: import sys, os workflow_version = os.environ['SemVer'] sys.stdout.write(workflow_version) #from subprocess import check_output #readme = check_output('/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c "Print readme" info.plist', shell=True)
import sys import ulysses_view view_to_set = sys.argv[1] ulysses_view.set_view_setting("group", view_to_set)
Choose view to open groups in
Choose view to open sheets in
import sys import ulysses_view view_to_set = sys.argv[1] ulysses_view.set_view_setting("sheet", view_to_set)

on run argv
set theQuery to item 1 of argv
--bring Ulysses to forground starting if necessary activate application "UlyssesMac" --Ulysses takes a while to open its main window even after it has started. --So loop until its in the forground: repeat while getFrontmostApplicationName() is not "UlyssesMac" delay 0.2 end repeat tell application "System Events" keystroke "O" using command down end tell return theQuery
end run
on getFrontmostApplicationName() tell application "System Events" set frontApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true end tell return frontApp end getFrontmostApplicationName

on run argv repeat until application "Ulysses" is running delay .2 end repeat try set viewToOpen to item 1 of argv #delay .2 tell application "System Events" to tell process "Ulysses" tell menu item viewToOpen of menu "View" of menu bar item "View" of menu bar 1 if value of attribute "AXMenuItemMarkChar" is not "âœ“" then click end tell end tell on error errStr number errorNumber if the errorNumber is equal to -1719 then set theAlertText to "Cannot change the View setting in Ulysses." set theAlertMessage to errStr & "
Allow Alfred access in the Accessibility section of the Privacy tab of your Mac's Security & Privacy System preferences; or use u:setsheetview and u:setgroupview to se both to Default." display alert theAlertText message theAlertMessage as critical buttons {"Cancel", "Open Preferences"} default button "Open Preferences" cancel button "Cancel" --> Result: {button returned:"Open Preferences"} tell application "System Preferences" activate set current pane to pane "com.apple.preference.security" end tell else -- An unknown error occurred. Resignal, so the caller -- can handle it, or AppleScript can display the number. error errStr number errorNumber end if end try end run

import sys, os
import ulysses_view
node_type = os.environ['node_type'] sys.stdout.write(ulysses_view.get_view_setting(node_type))

Alfred 3 workflow for Ulysses
See - packal.org/workflow/ulysses or - https://github.com/robwalton/alfred-ulysses-workflow/blob/master/README.md for full instructions
For help vsit - http://www.alfredforum.com/topic/9662-ulysses-workflow/
Copy and paste {query} into 'Open' dialogue field
Wait for Ulysses to start. Then Switch to configured view BUT OSX needs alfred accesibility access

if var:content_query != ""
then highlight query in sheet
Work aroud racecondition in variable to python
About to open or create note
Activate Ulyssis and wait until running then send cmd-O
